required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 03, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Diagnosis and Treatment of Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
clinical_study.official_title: Diagnosis and Treatment of Patients With Cystic Fibrosis

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)

clinical_study.source: National Institutes of Health Clinical Center (CC)

brief_summary.textblock: This is an omnibus protocol for studying patients with cystic fibrosis. The main purpose of the study is to obtain samples and data collected during standard clinical care for future research to expand knowledge of the natural history, clinical manifestations (phenotypes) and the genetic variants (genotypes) of cystic fibrosis....

detailed_description.textblock: This is an omnibus protocol for studying patients with cystic fibrosis. The main purpose of the study is to obtain samples and data collected during standard clinical care for future research to expand knowledge of the natural history, clinical manifestations (phenotypes) and the genetic variants (genotypes) of cystic fibrosis.

primary_outcome.measure: To develop a database and collection of samples obtained from patients with CF during their clinical care to allow for future research
primary_outcome.description: To develop a collection of samples and a database from patients with cystic fibrosis to be used in future research.

study_pop.textblock: Primarily local population but also any adult patient/relative that moves into the area, either through CF Foundation or relocating for personal reasons.

criteria.textblock:
- INCLUSION CRITERIA
- Patients with known or suspected CF and family members of patients with CF.
- >=4 years of age
EXCLUSION CRITERIA
-Concomitant medical, psychiatric or other problems which might complicate interpretation of studies of CF, or for which we are unable to provide adequate care.

overall_official.affiliation: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)

facility.name: National Institutes of Health Clinical Center

link.description: NIH Clinical Center Detailed Web Page

patient_data.ipd_description: .We are open to sharing IPD if requested, but it has not as-to-date been requested from this protocol.
